name: Ludus Vitae
description:
Ludus Vitae is a 3D, first-person horror game where life, death, and fate intertwine at the roll of a die. Survive nightmarish encounters dealt by a mysterious entity in the struggle to determine the fate of your soul.

WARNING: This game contains jump scares, loud noises, dark and creepy environments, and other horror elements. Headphones are highly recommended.

Team:

Ohanno Trevino - Animation, Art/3D Assets

Brittany N. Eide - Project Lead, Art/3D Assets

Jakob Jaeger - Programming, Level Design

Giovanni Sierra - Programming, Level Design

James Ostrander - Programming, Level Design

Allan Tom-Wolverton - Programming, Level Design

Michael Issa - Producer, Sound Design

Michael Tsui - Playtester

Isaac Brunt - Playtester
